extendedInfo.description: ** NEW VERSION 1.5 **"Videocam illusion" is the first video camera app that lets you record videos with effects in real-time.Combine filters, effects and masks to create amazing videos without an editing software.You can even save your favorite combinations of effects and change while you're recording, creating original movies.*********************Do you like this app? you can buy PRO version with more features. Each purchase motivates us to further improve the app and work on new innovative features. Thanks!If you have any problem with the application or want to suggest some improvements, please contact us at camera.illusion@gmail.com*********************- Features:+ 6 filters: mono, color, Chicago, pencil, thermal & x-ray.+ 5 effects: blur, fat, mosaic, light tunnel & pinch.+ 4 masks: 8mm, cork board, bricks & white border.+ 2 recording speeds: normal & fast.+ Upload your videos: Youtube, GMail, Dropbox, ... + 3 memories for storing your favorite combos.+ Change the effects while recording.- Tips!!!+ Videos are stored on the SD card, inside the folder "Videocamillusion"+ If the recording does not run very smooth try lowering the video resolution (in the Settings)+ Some filters and effects (e.g. blur) require a device with high processing power to work properly+ You can also play the recorded videos on a PC/MAC using QuickTime Player, Windows Media Player or VideoLAN+ Touch the screen to autofocus+ Press the volume keys to change the selected memory combo+ Some phones do not support all audio qualities. You can change the recording quality from the Settings+ To switch between front and rear camera during recording you must select the same resolution on both cameras

reviews.title: If only
reviews.comment: This is an excellent app, its what ive been looking for. The reason I\'m giving 3 stars is because i can only play the video in the app. If I try to send it to fb or gmail or send it via text it gives me a \"video cannot be played\" message on my Samsung galaxy s4. Is there something I\'m missing that you could help me with? If this problem can be solved I\'d be happy to give 5 stars and buy the pro version. This is the only app of its kind out there! And I do love it.
reviews.author: Jennifer Jane

reviews.title: Yay!
reviews.comment: I love using the black n white old film 8m. Works well no lag with my htc one.   One suggestion, make it possible to share it to instagram :)
reviews.author: yatty saliman

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: I wouldn\'t recommend This application to my worst enemy!!! This was a complete waste of time, definitely uninstalling. Unless you have a MAJOR update to fix This crap lousy  application. Fore closes constantly!!!
reviews.author: Alexandra Buyck

reviews.title: Awesomeness
reviews.comment: One of the best video capture apps I have tried. Had issues with the stock camera of my custom HTC Desire (JB 4.2.2) and this app solved the missing video capability I had. Works well with autofocus and the many effects that come with the app. Video playback works fine on MX Player and I would think that it should work fine on any other player as the files are in .mov format. And other users complain about the recording being laggy is mainly because of the high res settings chosen (more of a hardware limitation than the app at fault). I do wish the UI could be a little more refined though, and the app icon is well...is unconventional. Anyway, highly recommended and keep up the good work guys!
reviews.author: Edwin Tan

reviews.title: How can I save videos to my own gallery?
reviews.comment: I have a klip, and i cant seem to upload the videos (says its unvalid video) so i have to somehow get the videos in my own personal gallery. How can i do this? Help and ill gove 5 stars. Great app anyway.
